scripts.build: bun run clean:generated && bun run db:generate && bun run with-env tsup
scripts.build:docker: bun run clean:generated && bun run db:generate:prod && tsup
scripts.watch: bun run db:generate && bun run with-env tsup --watch
scripts.db:push: bun run with-env prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate:dev: bun run with-env prisma migrate dev --schema ./prisma
scripts.db:migrate:prod: bun run with-env prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:reset: bun run with-env prisma migrate reset
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules .turbo dist generated/ tsconfig.tsbuildinfo tsup.config.bundled*
